title: How to change from using the noFlakes template

posts.content:
Login into as your usual forum user. Click on the "profile" link at the top of the page.

Scroll down to the "board style" link.
Select default as the board style.
Scroll down to the bottom of the page, and click on the submite button.

If you have any issues, or question - please email ssvcforum@ssvc.org.uk with a clear description of what is happening. Dont' just say it's not working.

thanks

Miles.
